title: Patrick Ewing and Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Hall of Fame center Patrick Ewing and Jeff Van Gundy join The Woj Pod to go inside the 1990's New York Knicks-Chicago Bulls rivalry, including Michael Jordan, the playoff series fights, the 'Con Man' game, Pat Riley and the X-Man, and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
